subject: Technology
title: AI-Generated Content: The Synthetic Internet
description: A short lesson to help you apply AI-Generated Content: The Synthetic Internet.

hook.text: AI can now write articles, create images, and produce videos. Soon, most internet content may be machine-made.

buildup.text: ChatGPT, DALL-E, and Midjourney generate content indistinguishable from human work in seconds.

discovery.text: Spam farms use AI to generate thousands of fake articles daily, flooding social media and search engines.

twist.text: AI content trains the next AI generation. Machines learning from machines creates a feedback loop of declining quality.

climax.text: The internet may become mostly synthetic. Finding authentic human content could become the real challenge.

punchline.text: We built AI to create content. Now the internet is drowning in it.

quiz.question: What happens when AI trains on AI-generated content?
options: A feedback loop of decreasing quality occurs
